description.ko: 심해의 고압 심연 속에서 투명한 생명체들이 추는 평화로운 춤을 포착합니다.
description.en: Capturing the peaceful dance of transparent life forms in the high-pressure depths of the midnight ocean.

prompt: A spectral, translucent leviathan composed of bioluminescent glass-like membranes drifting through a deep sea trench illuminated by dancing caustic light and floating azure spores. Detailed fluid simulation with rising bubbles and intricate caustic patterns projected onto the sea floor. Focus on deep-sea translucency and membrane textures. 8k, Octane Render. Raytraced caustics and volumetric underwater lighting create a mysterious, serene atmosphere in the high-pressure abyss.
